Plot: Set in the days of the Empire, with the British ruling in Burma, Orwell's book describes corruption and imperial bigotry. Flory, a white timber merchant, befriends Dr Veraswami, a black enthusiast for the Empire, whose downfall can only be prevented by membership at an all-white club.
Characters: John Flory, Elizabeth Lackersteen, Dr. Veraswami, U Po Kyin, Ma Hla May, Lieutenant Verrall, Ellis (Burmese Days), Mr. MacGregor, Mrs. Lackersteen, Mr. Lackersteen
